member.name: T:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for adding authentication support in Swagger.

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddSimpleAuthentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Adds authentication support in Swagger, enabling the Authorize button in the Swagger UI, reading configuration from the specified source.
member.param: The name of the configuration section that holds authentication settings (default: Authentication).

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddSimpleAuthentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds authentication support in Swagger, enabling the Authorize button in the Swagger UI, reading configuration from a section named Authentication in source.
member.param: The name of additional security definitions that have been defined in Swagger.

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddSimpleAuthentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds authentication support in Swagger, enabling the Authorize button in the Swagger UI, reading configuration from the specified source.
member.param: The name of the configuration section that holds authentication settings (default: Authentication).
The name of additional security definitions that have been defined in Swagger.

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddSimpleAuthentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiSecurityRequirement[])
member.summary: Adds authentication support in Swagger, enabling the Authorize button in the Swagger UI, reading configuration from the specified source.
member.param: Additional security requirements to be added to Swagger definition.

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddSimpleAuthentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String,Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiSecurityRequirement[])
member.summary: Adds authentication support in Swagger, enabling the Authorize button in the Swagger UI, reading configuration from the specified source.
member.param: The name of the configuration section that holds authentication settings (default: Authentication).
Additional security requirements to be added to Swagger definition.

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddOAuth2Authentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Adds OAuth2 custom authentication support in Swagger, for example for example to integrate with Microsoft.Identity.Web.
member.param: The name of the OAuth2 authentication scheme to add.
The Authorization Url for OAuth2 authorization.
The Token Url for OAuth2 authorization.

member.name: M:SimpleAuthentication.SwaggerExtensions.AddOAuth2Authentication(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SwaggerGenOptions,System.String,Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOAuthFlow)
member.summary: Adds OAuth2 custom authentication support in Swagger, for example for example to integrate with Microsoft.Identity.Web.
member.param: The name of the OAuth2 authentication scheme to add.
The object that describes the authorization flow.
